title: Collapsible gates shall not be permitted for lifts; the lifts shall have solid doors with fire resistance of at least one hour
clause_text: Collapsible gates shall not be permitted for lifts; the lifts shall have solid doors with fire resistance of at least one hour.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Collapsible gates shall not be permitted for lifts; the lifts shall have solid doors with fire resistance of at least one hour.
